>>>>> "Roy" == Roy T Fielding <fielding@...> writes:

    Roy> Has anyone looked at Dream yet to see how RESTful it actually
    Roy> is?

It still requires cookies...

I would say it is on the right track, but I would prefer a more
declarative approach.

- -- 
All the best,

Berend de Boer
